languages.text: "Я склоняюсь к тому, что Стракс отдалился от Лекс Империалис. В букве закона Его все ответы и все решения, но Стракс стал нетверд в суждениях и начал внимать советам Вультур. Ослабление веры сделало его слепым и привело к закономерному и полному позора концу".

"I'm inclined to believe that Strachs had grown too distant from the Lex Imperialis. The letter of His Law holds all the answers and solutions, but Strachs faltered in his judgement and turned to Vultur for advice. His waning faith made him blind and led him to a predictable and ignominious end."
languages.original_text: "Я склоняюсь к тому, что Стракс отдалился от Лекс Империалис. В букве закона Его все ответы и все решения, но Стракс стал нетверд в суждениях и начал внимать советам Вультур. Ослабление веры сделало его слепым и привело к закономерному и полному позора концу".

The letter of His law holds all the answers and solutions, but Strachs faltered in his judgement and turned to Vultur for advice. His waning faith made him blind and led him to a predictable and ignominious end."

languages.text: 「ストラッチスはレックス・インペリアからあまりにも遠ざかっていたと考えています。陛下の法の文言には、すべての答えと解決が記されているのです。ですがストラッチスは判断を誤り、ヴァルターの助言を仰ぎました。信仰が揺らいだことで目が曇り、やがて彼は予想通りの、不名誉な最期を迎えたのです」
languages.original_text: "I'm inclined to believe that Strachs had grown too distant from the Lex Imperialis. The letter of His Law holds all the answers and solutions, but Strachs faltered in his judgement and turned to Vultur for advice. His waning faith made him blind and led him to a predictable and ignominious end."

traits.locale_text: 「ストラッチスはレックス・インペリアからあまりにも遠ざかっていたと考えています。陛下の法の文言には、すべての答えと解決が記されているのです。ですがストラッチスは判断を誤り、ヴァルターの助言を仰ぎました。信仰が揺らいだことで目が曇り、やがて彼は予想通りの、不名誉な最期を迎えたのです」

languages.text: "Ich neige dazu, anzunehmen, dass Strachs sich zu weit vom Lex Imperia entfernt hat. Die Worte Seines Gesetzes enthalten alle Antworten und Lösungen, aber Strachs Urteilsvermögen ließ nach, und er suchte Rat bei Vultur. Sein schwindender Glaube machte ihn blind und führte ihn zu einem vorhersehbaren und schändlichen Ende."
languages.original_text: "I'm inclined to believe that Strachs had grown too distant from the Lex Imperialis. The letter of His Law holds all the answers and solutions, but Strachs faltered in his judgement and turned to Vultur for advice. His waning faith made him blind and led him to a predictable and ignominious end."

traits.locale_text: "Ich neige dazu, anzunehmen, dass Strachs sich zu weit vom Lex Imperia entfernt hat. Die Worte Seines Gesetzes enthalten alle Antworten und Lösungen, aber Strachs Urteilsvermögen ließ nach, und er suchte Rat bei Vultur. Sein schwindender Glaube machte ihn blind und führte ihn zu einem vorhersehbaren und schändlichen Ende."

languages.text: « J'ai tendance à penser que Strachs avait perdu de vue la Lex Imperialis. La lettre de Sa Loi apporte réponses et solutions, mais Stachs a failli en se fiant aux conseils de Vultur. Sa foi vacillante l'a rendu aveugle et l'a précipité vers une fin aussi prévisible qu'ignoble. »
languages.original_text: "I'm inclined to believe that Strachs had grown too distant from the Lex Imperialis. The letter of His Law holds all the answers and solutions, but Strachs faltered in his judgement and turned to Vultur for advice. His waning faith made him blind and led him to a predictable and ignominious end."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai tendance à penser que Strachs avait perdu de vue la Lex Imperialis. La lettre de Sa Loi apporte réponses et solutions, mais Stachs a failli en se fiant aux conseils de Vultur. Sa foi vacillante l'a rendu aveugle et l'a précipité vers une fin aussi prévisible qu'ignoble. »

« J'ai tendance à penser que Strachs avait perdu de vue la Lex Imperialis. La lettre de Sa Loi apporte réponses et solutions, mais Stachs a failli en se fiant aux conseils de Vultur. Sa foi vacillante l'a rendu aveugle et l'a précipité vers une fin aussi prévisible qu'ignoble. »

languages.text: «Me siento inclinado a creer que Strachs se había distanciado demasiado de la Lex Imperialis. Su ley contiene todas las respuestas y soluciones, pero Strachs vaciló en su cometido y acudió a Vultur en busca de consejo. Su pérdida de fe lo cegó y precipitó un final tan predecible como ignominioso».
languages.original_text: "I'm inclined to believe that Strachs had grown too distant from the Lex Imperialis. The letter of His Law holds all the answers and solutions, but Strachs faltered in his judgement and turned to Vultur for advice. His waning faith made him blind and led him to a predictable and ignominious end."

traits.locale_text: «Me siento inclinado a creer que Strachs se había distanciado demasiado de la Lex Imperialis. Su ley contiene todas las respuestas y soluciones, pero Strachs vaciló en su cometido y acudió a Vultur en busca de consejo. Su pérdida de fe lo cegó y precipitó un final tan predecible como ignominioso».

languages.text: “我更倾向于认为，这是因为斯塔克斯与帝国律法之间的关系日益疏远。帝皇的律法囊括了一切答案与解决方案，但斯塔克斯却犹豫不决，无法做出决断，转而向沃尔图尔寻求建议。他的信仰日渐衰弱，他的判断也越发盲目，最终毫不意外地走向了可耻的结局。”
languages.original_text: "I'm inclined to believe that Strachs had grown too distant from the Lex Imperialis. The letter of His Law holds all the answers and solutions, but Strachs faltered in his judgement and turned to Vultur for advice. His waning faith made him blind and led him to a predictable and ignominious end."

traits.locale_text: “我更倾向于认为，这是因为斯塔克斯与帝国律法之间的关系日益疏远。帝皇的律法囊括了一切答案与解决方案，但斯塔克斯却犹豫不决，无法做出决断，转而向沃尔图尔寻求建议。他的信仰日渐衰弱，他的判断也越发盲目，最终毫不意外地走向了可耻的结局。”

languages.text: "Strachs'ın Lex İmperialis'ten fazlasıyla uzaklaştığına ikna olmama ramak kaldı. O'nun Kanunu'nun kelamı tüm cevaplara ve çözümlere sahipken Strachs, muhakemesinde yanlış yola saptı ve tavsiye almak için yüzünü Vultur'a çevirdi. Azalan inancı, gözlerini kör etti. Bu da yetmezmiş gibi hem öngörülebilir hem de yüz kızartıcı bir sona mahkûm oldu."
languages.original_text: "I'm inclined to believe that Strachs had grown too distant from the Lex Imperialis. The letter of His Law holds all the answers and solutions, but Strachs faltered in his judgement and turned to Vultur for advice. His waning faith made him blind and led him to a predictable and ignominious end."

traits.locale_text: "Strachs'ın Lex İmperialis'ten fazlasıyla uzaklaştığına ikna olmama ramak kaldı. O'nun Yasası'nın kelamı tüm cevaplara ve çözümlere sahipken Strachs, muhakemesinde yanlış yola saptı ve tavsiye almak için yüzünü Vultur'a çevirdi. Azalan inancı, gözlerini kör etti. Bu da yetmezmiş gibi hem öngörülebilir hem de yüz kızartıcı bir sona mahkûm oldu."

"Strachs'ın Lex İmperialis'ten fazlasıyla uzaklaştığına ikna olmama ramak kaldı. O'nun kanunlarının kelâmı, tüm cevaplara ve çözümlere sahipken Strachs muhakemesinde yanlış yola saptı ve tavsiye almak için yüzünü Vultur'a çevirdi. Azalan inancı gözlerini kör etti. Bu da yetmezmiş gibi hem öngörülebilir hem de yüz kızartıcı bir sona mahkûm oldu."
